name: Simplicity (yanniboi)
description:
A "Simple" game made in Godot  First ever game made in Godot so really just a learning experience. Was a lot of fun to make :) How To Play
  •  Try to get all the blocks to the end and score the most points.
  • Points per block reduce with every move you make.
  • You can toggle between collide and destroy modes.
Controls
  •  Move (any of the following)
    • WASD
    • Arrows
    • Swipe
    • Click and drag
  • Restart - R
  • Exit/Back - ESC
  • Toggle play mode - Space
Code

 All the code for this game is available on gitlab here:

https://gitlab.com/LPGames/gdfg-23-01/-/tree/main

Any questions feel free to contact me on Discord:

http://discord.lpgam.es
